hero.name: I'm Indras
hero.tagline: I build awesome websites for people
hero.intro: I'm a "Super" Dev... a Fullstack Web Developer that could handle both sides of the force, front-end and back-end.
hero.ask: Need help with a project? Let's work together.

about.title: A few words about me
about.intro: Hey there, my name is Indras, a web developer from Jakarta, Indonesia.
about.intro2: My mission is to help small businesses get noticed with their AWESOME online presence.
about.intro3: Currently, my main focus is on the front-end using HTML, Tailwind, PHP, Laravel, Vue, & Inertia.
about.intro4: I'm here to help you get that awesome online presence that you've always wanted.
about.intro5: I can help you put together your amazing photos and articles either by following your own design or I could arrange them for you. Turning them into a completely outstanding website that you can be proud of. Thus, boosting your business to the next level.
about.intro6: But, most importantly, I want to give you my absolutely best services at the best price. So don't hesitate to contact me to get a price tailored to your specific needs and budget.

contact.title: Let's get in touch
contact.intro: I'm currently available for freelance projects or full-time work.
contact.intro2: If you're interested in working with me, please fill in the form below. I'll be delighted to hear from you. Or feel free to just say hi. Let's be friends!
